text_prompt: Create an image following the given description: A photorealistic medieval fantasy CLOSE UP, shot on Arri Alexa 65 with Panavision anamorphic lenses, locked on the luminous GOLDEN LIGHT emanating from the center of the dark mirror, which should reference Image 1 contextually as the reflective surface or background element structure. Real human actors in practical costumes. Natural skin with pores, imperfections, freckles, and weathering. Warm golden palette for the magic scene.
